backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing products, categories, orders, and user profiles with admin/user authorization and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping branding, business-hours, and metadata updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend components, hooks, pages, and admin tools.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables defining light/dark color systems and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting SEO metadata and Open Graph tags reflecting the CAFE 37 branding and tagline.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and layout setup including public pages, admin routes protected by AdminGuard, and global providers.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context providing cart state, persistence, and operations for adding, updating, and removing items.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks admin privileges, offering login and navigation options.
Checks identity and admin status, showing a loading skeleton or access denied screen before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with retry and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/brand/PremiumTag: Displays the cafe’s tagline from shared content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders footer with cafe info, links, and social/share actions using cafe37 content.
frontend/src/components/nav/Header.tsx: Displays site header with navigation, cart button, login, and admin link when applicable.
frontend/src/components/products/Categor: Renders category filter buttons allowing selection of a specific product category or all.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Shows a product image, details, and add‑to‑cart button with navigation to the product page.
frontend/src/components/states/ErrorStat: Displays an error alert with optional retry action.
frontend/src/components/states/LoadingSk: Provides skeleton loaders for product cards, grids, and tables.
frontend/src/content/cafe37.ts: Contains static and computed metadata about Cafe 37 including hours, contact info, and highlights.
frontend/src/content/menuCategories.ts: Defines menu categories and a helper to resolve display names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, categories, orders, and related backend data via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, and global typography for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the café’s About page with story, features, and branded content sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Allows admins to view, create, edit, and delete product categories with dialog-based forms and table listings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin stats for products, categories, and orders, plus quick navigation actions and setup guidance.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin page that fetches and displays details for a single order, including items, totals, and customer info with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays a list of all orders with loading/error handling and navigation to order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for viewing, creating, editing, deleting, and seeding products, including a modal-based form and category selection.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and navigation to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows the menu catalog with category filtering, product listing, and add‑to‑cart interactions.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow with form validation, order submission, cart clearing, and confirmation display.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays café contact info, map embed, quick action buttons, and facility details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the café landing page with hero content, action buttons, highlights, and promo messaging.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and shows a product’s details with add‑to‑cart support, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/businessHours.ts: Defines weekly business hours and helper functions to format schedules, determine today's hours, and check if the café is currently open.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project state, features, pending requests, and metadata for the CAFE 37 site.
